metadata.title: CVE-2013-7488 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
perl-Convert-ASN1 (aka the Convert::ASN1 module for Perl) through 0.27allows remote attackers to cause an infinite loop via unexpected input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7488` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libconvert-asn1-perl - 0.33-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libconvert-asn1-perl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.33-1').
